properties.entry:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MEM_NO , GAME_NO , KOR_NAME , ENG_NAME , GAME_INTRO , PRICE , POINT , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM WISHLIST W LEFT JOIN UPLOAD_FILE UP USING(GAME_NO) LEFT JOIN GAME G USING(GAME_NO) WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND FILE_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY GAME_NO DESC
) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO WISHLIST ( MEM_NO , GAME_NO ) VALUES ( ? , ? )
DELETE FROM WISHLIST WHERE MEM_NO = ? AND GAME_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) "count" FROM WISHLIST WHERE MEM_NO = ?
